postCreateCommand: set -e; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends ca-certificates curl tar; ACTIONLINT_VERSION=1.7.10; ARCH=$(uname -m); case "$ARCH" in x86_64) A=amd64 ;; aarch64|arm64) A=arm64 ;; *) echo "Unsupported arch: $ARCH"; exit 1 ;; esac; curl -fsSL "https://github.com/rhysd/actionlint/releases/download/v${ACTIONLINT_VERSION}/actionlint_${ACTIONLINT_VERSION}_linux_${A}.tar.gz" -o /tmp/actionlint.tgz; sudo tar -xzf /tmp/actionlint.tgz -C /usr/local/bin actionlint; sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/actionlint; actionlint -version
